page.title: 04The Garden, Stoke-sub-Hamdon
page.content: Mrs.Beaumont's garden is behind the Primary School. It's so interesting because there are so many beautiful thing there. When we visited we saw lots of flowers, shrubs , fossiles and wildlife. There is an old water pump and a dogs grave. A tree had grown over a stump of tree which had been used as a seat. There were tables, chairs and benches. There was a pond but it does not hold water any more. They made a hole in the bottom of it because the hedge-hogs kept drowning in the water. The garden is so interesting that recently television cameras have gone there to film. When Mrs.Beaumont was a little girl she had a big garden. She had always wanted a big garden herself, so that's why she put lots of shrubs and flowers in it.
